post.body: so a conference is now a vacation? That's almost sad.
Just a re-do of a previous one. They took x-rays and were unhappy with one of the fillings. So they re-did it.. for free!
Based on my statistical graph, the next meetup should be February, probably at a restaurant north of the Dulles toll road.
yeah, the numb is was definitely weird. Now I just feel like a Hollywood Celeb, what with my puffy lip and all.
Yes, I'm really, really sore today. No, you didn't actually ask.
Prince. (duh) Kiss is the most famous perhaps, but there are many others.
yeah, I'm cramming too, but I'm drinking beer. And I'm sleepy. Which makes me an idiot. Going to brew some (caffeinated) tea now!
well, it's usually not coffee time at 11PM.
ooohhhh. I will totally follow you there. Remy Zero in effect. It has been a while!
btw, thanks for mentioning Absolute Watchmen. A $75 oversized watchmen book was perfect for my 40% off coupon at B&N. :)
Prince wrote "Manic Monday" for the Bangles. I'll fight you for scorning it!!!
Redistribution of popcorn in effect.
well, at least it's not flickering anymore. :)
meh, just have a good german beer and call it a day. :)
that is brilliant! Now he knows who to suck up to for next year's gifts. :)
Yes: to much email, too much twitter, too much facebook, too much RSS, and too much pseudo-random browsing topics of interest.
seriously. But when I get back I'll be able to jump right in. Yeah right. At least email, twitter, etc is taken care of for now
Yeah, my wife generally has nothing to do with video games. We do play Poker and Settlers, etc. though. I think good music helps.
isn't your sheer awesomeness enough proof! I guess I had it easy. I'll relay any other tips I hear.
it went perfectly fine for us. The 7yo sort of already knew, the 5yo was sort of confused but she was fine. Good Luck!
you're such a redneck (I'm headed to Target)
I'll have to try that. I usually just use SMS for Twitter anyway, but it'd be nice to not have to count to 140 in my head. :)
crappy! **rimshot**
It is surprisingly hard to drink out of a glass when your left upper lip is completely numb. A straw helps, but only slightly.
Back in the dentist chair. This time for a filling redo. I can feel the numbness in my eye!
Wow. This Tazo "Awake" tea is really awful compared to the MateVana I've been drinking for the past week. http://tinyurl.com/3tpscu
Hours later, after an unhelpful Archive & Install, turns out the double click speed setting affects how quickly Finder updates things. WHAT?
My official favorite Twitter user is now @technoweenie. He's the only one who ever mentions comic books. The rest of you need to step it up!
Finder is taking ~10 seconds to display the contents of a folder. AppleCare recommends Archive & Install. Anyone seen this? (OS X 10.5)
I'm enjoying the fact that @rich_kilmer had salad for lunch to be healthy, but that left him hungry. So now he's eating microwave popcorn.
Happy new year! From me, my wife and my very tired (but happy) kids.
Walked into the TV room to see my son playing Tool on Guitar Hero World Tour. I have successfully cloned myself.
Apparently it takes me 1.5 hours per day-without-touching-my-computer to get ready to actually start coding. And now I have to leave again.
Played Guitar Hero World Tour for almost 3 hours last night with my wife. She was the drummer. She loves it. I'll never work at night again.
We revealed the truth about Santa to the kids this morning, just before opening gifts. Hey, I didn't want that chump getting all the credit!
Merry Christmas Everyone! My 5yo daughter also says Merry Christmas. My wife and 6yo son are sensible enough to still be asleep.
I feel so uncool for not caring about git. Actually, it doesn't really bother me.
Looks like my "cold" was allergies. I took a Claritan D before bed last night and I feel great today. Still some symptoms, but pretty mild.
Heading to the doc to try to figure out why I've been sick for the past month. I'm starting to think I have allergies. Or I need more sleep.
Saw IMAX trailers for Watchmen and Star Trek a few hours ago. I think my jaw is finally off the floor. Watchmen looks unbelievable.
